reviews.review:
This is the best marvel movie without a doubt. 
Brilliantly scripted from start to end and I didn't want the movie to end.
This was awesome all around and I can’t wait for the next movie in the series.

Utterly ridiculous in the best way. The pace doesn't slow for a second from start to finish and all the fan service that is required after a TEN YEAR period of killer Marvel Studios movies coming out is fulfilled...and then added to. Brolin is believable and terrifying, and the Avengers crew are as stellar as usual. I already can't wait to see it again...and many other times at home. Sublime.

A complete masterpiece with a lot of cameos. It may not be a complete movie but come on there is a another movie next year. This movie was great.
9.8/10
It honestly annoys the hell outta me that Captain Marvel won't be in this but I'm still excited as hell!

Here are my thoughts of “Avengers: Infinity War”: 10 years of buildup has lead to this. Marvel Studios promised a movie worth 10 years of building a cinematic universe. And, worth it, it sure as hell was. This IS Thanos’s movie. There are surprises no one is expecting. There are character interactions that will make people giddy. But, as much as the humor isn’t lost, darkness isn’t abandoned. Because when Thanos shows up, consequences there are. Trust me when I say no one is prepared for what they see. “Avengers: Infinity War” is indeed worth the hype. One of the best Marvel movies ever. And, Thanos is the best Marvel movie villain ever. Josh Brolin NAILED him. And, that’s why this movie succeeded. Well done, Disney, Marvel Studios and Kevin Feige. You did it. I give “Infinity War” a 5-Star rating. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Also, there is one surprise in this movie the anti-Disney trolls hopefully failed to spoil. And, that’s why I say to them when they try to spoil the movie: #NotTodayZurg.

The culmination of 10 years of Superheroes fighting Aliens, Machines, Demi-Gods, and even other superheroes. The Mad Titan THANOS (played brilliantly by Josh Brolin) arrives and it takes literally every single superhero in the Marvel Universe to stop him! A nonstop two and a half hours that doesn’t let up, and offers a shocking ending you can only see to believe
Epic Movie with all our Marvel dreams comes true!
Probably a longer more coherent film left on cutting room floor like Age of Ultron, but still, what ride!!
Avengers Infinity War was a master piece! Filled to the brim with beautiful scenes, a twisted plot, and an emotional roller coaster! Great movie, I highly recommend watching it!
